"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the smallest and greatest possible numbers of cards labelled ‘3’ are "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"M"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" respectively, find the value of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"m+M"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":". "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"In other words, there is exactly one ‘3’ among any 4 consecutive cards."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"The sequence "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 2, 1, 3, 1, 2, 1, 3,..., 1, 2, 1, 3"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" satisfies all of above conditions."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Taking derivative of both sides"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Differentiate once again"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{P^{''} (x)}{P(x)}-\left(\frac{P^{'} (x)}{P(x)}\right)^2 = -\left[\frac{1}{(1-x_{1})^2} + \frac{1}{(1-x_{2})^2}+...+\frac{1}{(1-x_{2016})^2}\right]"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Multiply by "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"-1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left(\frac{P^{'} (x)}{P(x)}\right)^2-\frac{P^{''} (x)}{P(x)} = \left[\frac{1}{(1-x_{1})^2} + \frac{1}{(1-x_{2})^2}+...+\frac{1}{(1-x_{2016})^2}\right]"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}},{"type":"text","text":" "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Put "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"x=1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in above equation and thats the desired answer"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P(1)=2017, P'(x)=2016x^{2015}+2015x^{2014}+...+2x+1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P'(1)=2016+2015+...1=\frac{(2016)(2015)}{2}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P''(x)=(2016)(2015)x^{2014}+(2015)(2014)x^{2013}+...+(3)(2)x+(2)(1)"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"P''(1)=\displaystyle \sum_{n=1}^{2015} n(n+1) =\displaystyle \sum_{n=1}^{2015} n^2+ \displaystyle \sum_{n=1}^{2015} n = \frac{(2015)(2016)(4031)}{6}+ \frac{(2015)(2016)}{2} = \frac{(2015)(2016)}{6}\left(4031+3\right) = \frac{(2015)(2016)}{6}\left(4034\right) "}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{P'(1)}{P(1)}=\frac{(2016)(2017)}{2 \times 2017} = \frac{2016}{2}= 1008"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\frac{P''(1)}{P(1)}=\frac{(2015)(2016)}{6}\left(\frac{4034}{2017}\right)=\frac{(2015)(2016)}{6} \times 2 = 2015 \times 672"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Now Required answer = "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\left(\frac{P'(1)}{P(1)}\right)^2 - \frac{P''(1)}{P(1)} = (1008)^2 - 2015\times 6072 = \boxed{-338016}"}],"attrs":{"inline":false}}]},{"type":"text","text":"
